quote: Women, like men, should try to do the impossible. And when they fail, their failure should be a challenge to others.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: No doubt exists that all women are crazy; it's only a question of degree.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: Women are the real architects of society.
author: Cher

quote: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Women hold up half the sky.
author: Mao Zedong

quote: If women can be railroad workers in Russia, why can't they fly in space?
author: Valentina Tereshkova

quote: Women are made to be loved, not understood.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Ah, women. They make the highs higher and the lows more frequent.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Men are April when they woo, December when they wed. Maids are May when they are maids, but the sky changes when they are wives.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I don't know who invented high heels, but all women owe him a lot.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Clever and attractive women do not want to vote; they are willing to let men govern as long as they govern men.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: If women were particular about men's characters, they would never get married at all.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Man does not control his own fate. The women in his life do that for him.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: The only really happy folk are married women and single men.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Women have simple tastes. They get pleasure out of the conversation of children in arms and men in love.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Women always excel men in that sort of wisdom which comes from experience. To be a woman is in itself a terrible experience.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Being the boss anywhere is lonely. Being a female boss in a world of mostly men is especially so.
author: Robert Frost

quote: When women go wrong, men go right after them.
author: Mae West

quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: A women who doesn't wear perfume has no future.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: I don't know why women want any of the things men have when one of the things that women have is men.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Women have always been the strong ones of the world. The men are always seeking from women a little pillow to put their heads down on. They are always longing for the mother who held them as infants.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Women must tell men always that they are the strong ones. They are the big, the strong, the wonderful. In truth, women are the strong ones. It is just my opinion, I am not a professor.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: The appalling thing is the degree of charity women are capable of. You see it all the time... love lavished on absolute fools. Love's a charity ward, you know.
author: Lawrence Durrell

quote: If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: I owe nothing to Women's Lib.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: It may be the cock that crows, but it is the hen that lays the eggs.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: My mother told me two things constantly. One was to be a lady and the other was to be independent, and the law was something most unusual for those times because for most girls growing up in the '40s, the most important degree was not your B.A. but your M.R.S.
author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: Men are by nature merely indifferent to one another; but women are by nature enemies.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: I'm not denyin' the women are foolish. God Almighty made 'em to match the men.
author: George Eliot

quote: Wives are young men's mistresses, companions for middle age, and old men's nurses.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: You can tell the strength of a nation by the women behind its men.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Women hate everything which strips off the tinsel of sentiment, and they are right, or it would rob them of their weapons.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Women want mediocre men, and men are working to be as mediocre as possible.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: Clearly older women and especially older women who have led an active life or elder women who successfully maneuver through their own family life have so much to teach us about sharing, patience, and wisdom.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Single women have a dreadful propensity for being poor. Which is one very strong argument in favor of matrimony.
author: Jane Austen

quote: This man is frank and earnest with women. In Fresno, he's Frank and in Chicago he's Ernest.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: I write for those women who do not speak, for those who do not have a voice because they were so terrified, because we are taught to respect fear more than ourselves. We've been taught that silence would save us, but it won't.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: I feel there is something unexplored about woman that only a woman can explore.
author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: Friends are generally of the same sex, for when men and women agree, it is only in the conclusions; their reasons are always different.
author: George Santayana

quote: Women are naturally secretive, and they like to do their own secreting.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot.
author: John Lennon

quote: I've yet to be on a campus where most women weren't worrying about some aspect of combining marriage, children, and a career. I've yet to find one where many men were worrying about the same thing.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Some of us are becoming the men we wanted to marry.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Childbirth is more admirable than conquest, more amazing than self-defense, and as courageous as either one.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: It is easier for women to succeed in business, the arts, and politics in America than in Europe.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: In our society, the women who break down barriers are those who ignore limits.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: In too many instances, the march to globalization has also meant the marginalization of women and girls. And that must change.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: One can find women who have never had one love affair, but it is rare indeed to find any who have had only one.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: There are few virtuous women who are not bored with their trade.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Women have been called queens for a long time, but the kingdom given them isn't worth ruling.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Women's Lib? Oh, I'm afraid it doesn't interest me one bit. I've been so liberated it hurts.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: To understand how any society functions you must understand the relationship between the men and the women.
author: Angela Davis

quote: Honor your daughters. They are honorable.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Women in love are less ashamed than men. They have less to be ashamed of.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Women, can't live with them, can't live without them.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: I never realized until lately that women were supposed to be the inferior sex.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Plain women know more about men than beautiful women do.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Only men who are not interested in women are interested in women's clothes. Men who like women never notice what they wear.
author: Anatole France

quote: Women need not always keep their mouths shut and their wombs open.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: Women wish to be loved without a why or a wherefore; not because they are pretty, or good, or well-bred, or graceful, or intelligent, but because they are themselves.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Whether women are better than men I cannot say - but I can say they are certainly no worse.
author: Golda Meir

quote: Men mourn for what they have lost; women for what they ain't got.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Men are governed by lines of intellect - women: by curves of emotion.
author: James Joyce

quote: How wrong it is for a woman to expect the man to build the world she wants, rather than to create it herself.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Women who seek to be equal with men lack ambition.
author: Timothy Leary

quote: I grew up in the Bronx where you would stay up late with your girlfriends, just being silly in our bedrooms, whatever. And I was always the clown.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: The most virtuous women have something within them, something that is never chaste.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: It is capitalist America that produced the modern independent woman. Never in history have women had more freedom of choice in regard to dress, behavior, career, and sexual orientation.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: When anything goes, it's women who lose.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: Woman is the dominant sex. Men have to do all sorts of stuff to prove that they are worthy of woman's attention.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: Younger women have no problem in reconciling beauty with ambitions as a professional woman.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: I think that maybe if women and children were in charge we would get somewhere.
author: James Thurber

quote: Women have always been courageous... They are always fearless when protecting their children and in the last century they have been fearless in the fight for their rights.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: Men are allowed to have passion and commitment for their work... a woman is allowed that feeling for a man, but not her work.
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: Why is it men are permitted to be obsessed about their work, but women are only permitted to be obsessed about men?
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: A man who graduated high in his class at Yale Law School and made partnership in a top law firm would be celebrated. A man who invested wisely would be admired, but a woman who accomplishes this is treated with suspicion.
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: I like intelligent women. When you go out, it shouldn't be a staring contest.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: I'm supposed to have a Ph.D. on the subject of women. But the truth is I've flunked more often than not. I'm very fond of women; I admire them. But, like all men, I don't understand them.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Women, you can have it all - a loving man, devoted husband, loving children, a fabulous career.
author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quote: There's no evidence whatsoever that men are more rational than women. Both sexes seem to be equally irrational.
author: Albert Ellis

quote: On the whole, I think women wear too much and are to fussy. You can't see the person for all the clutter.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: Women cannot complain about men anymore until they start getting better taste in them.
author: Bill Maher

quote: I do not wish women to have power over men; but over themselves.
author: Mary Shelley

quote: Women get more unhappy the more they try to liberate themselves.
author: Brigitte Bardot

quote: I will not say that women have no character; rather, they have a new one every day.
author: Heinrich Heine

quote: Charm, in most men and nearly all women, is a decoration.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: I measure the progress of a community by the degree of progress which women have achieved.
author: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: You can't raise the standard of women's morals by raising their pay envelope. It lies deeper than that.
author: Billy Sunday

quote: Women's liberation is the liberation of the feminine in the man and the masculine in the woman.
author: Corita Kent

quote: Most women set out to try to change a man, and when they have changed him they do not like him.
author: Marlene Dietrich

quote: Any time women come together with a collective intention, it's a powerful thing. Whether it's sitting down making a quilt, in a kitchen preparing a meal, in a club reading the same book, or around the table playing cards, or planning a birthday party, when women come together with a collective intention, magic happens.
author: Phylicia Rashad

quote: Women need real moments of solitude and self-reflection to balance out how much of ourselves we give away.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: Women love always: when earth slips from them, they take refuge in heaven.
author: George Sand

quote: It's incredibly unfair. You don't see a lot of 60-year-old women with 20-year-old men onscreen.
author: George Clooney

quote: Women will never be as successful as men because they have no wives to advise them.
author: Dick Van Dyke

quote: Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: From birth to age 18 a girl needs good parents. From 18 to 35 she needs good looks. From 35 to 55 she needs a good personality. From 55 on, she needs good cash.
author: Sophie Tucker

quote: Emancipation of women has made them lose their mystery.
author: Grace Kelly

quote: People don't want to see women doing things they don't think women should do.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I would not send a poor girl into the world, ignorant of the snares that beset her path; nor would I watch and guard her, till, deprived of self-respect and self-reliance, she lost the power or the will to watch and guard herself.
author: Anne Bronte

quote: They say that women talk too much. If you have worked in Congress you know that the filibuster was invented by men.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: In politics women type the letters, lick the stamps, distribute the pamphlets and get out the vote. Men get elected.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: When men reach their sixties and retire, they go to pieces. Women go right on cooking.
author: Gail Sheehy

quote: Disguise our bondage as we will, 'Tis woman, woman, rules us still.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: I guess at the end of the day, all women like to be appreciated and treated with respect and kindness.
author: Sofia Vergara

quote: All women should know how to take care of children. Most of them will have a husband some day.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: After all those years as a woman hearing 'not thin enough, not pretty enough, not smart enough, not this enough, not that enough,' almost overnight I woke up one morning and thought, 'I'm enough.'
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: I am my own woman.
author: Evita Peron

quote: I demanded more rights for women because I know what women had to put up with.
author: Evita Peron

quote: Speaking very generally, I find that women are spiritually, emotionally, and often physically stronger than men.
author: Gary Oldman

quote: For women's tears are but the sweat of eyes.
author: Juvenal

quote: Women have a favorite room, men a favorite chair.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: The sight of women talking together has always made men uneasy; nowadays it means rank subversion.
author: Germaine Greer

quote: The trouble with life is that there are so many beautiful women and so little time.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Women like to sit down with trouble - as if it were knitting.
author: Ellen Glasgow

quote: There is a physical relationship with a woman that you don't have with anybody else, but that's not about love. Love is a spiritual thing.
author: Ziggy Marley

quote: I'll always prefer to play with women and hang out with women, and I'll always be a feminist.
author: Courtney Love

quote: I think God made a woman to be strong and not to be trampled under the feet of men. I've always felt this way because my mother was a very strong woman, without a husband.
author: Little Richard

quote: But, alas! what poor Woman is ever taught that she should have a higher Design than to get her a Husband?
author: Mary Astell

quote: If men knew all that women think, they would be twenty times more audacious.
author: Alphonse Karr

quote: You see a lot of smart guys with dumb women, but you hardly ever see a smart woman with a dumb guy.
author: Erica Jong

quote: Men and women, women and men. It will never work.
author: Erica Jong

quote: Women have a predestination to suffering.
author: Bela Lugosi

quote: A woman has two smiles that an angel might envy, the smile that accepts a lover before words are uttered, and the smile that lights on the first born babe, and assures it of a mother's love.
author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quote: Women are frightening. If you get to 41 as a man, you're quite battle-scarred.
author: Hugh Grant

quote: Women think with their whole bodies and they see things as a whole more than men do.
author: Dorothy Day

quote: Women should try to increase their size rather than decrease it, because I believe the bigger we are, the more space we'll take up, and the more we'll have to be reckoned with.
author: Roseanne Barr

quote: I think today women are very scared to celebrate themselves, because then they just get labeled.
author: Charlize Theron

quote: I think that women just have a primeval instinct to make soup, which they will try to foist on anybody who looks like a likely candidate.
author: Dylan Moran

quote: The No. 1 impediment to women succeeding in the workforce is now in the home.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: Women don't take enough risks. Men are just 'foot on the gas pedal.' We're not going to close the achievement gap until we close the ambition gap.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: In life, single women are the most vulnerable adults. In movies, they are given imaginary power.
author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quote: The labor of women in the house, certainly, enables men to produce more wealth than they otherwise could; and in this way women are economic factors in society. But so are horses.
author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quote: I think women are excellent social critics.
author: Laurie Anderson

quote: The connections between and among women are the most feared, the most problematic, and the most potentially transforming force on the planet.
author: Adrienne Rich

quote: I believe women still face a glass ceiling that must be shattered.
author: Andrew Cuomo

quote: Women hear rhythm differently than men.
author: Elvis Costello

quote: I have been a woman for fifty years, and I've never yet been able to discover precisely what it is I am.
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: When women are encouraged to be competitive, too many of them become disagreeable.
author: Benjamin Spock

quote: We're getting ready to take over the world. My group of girlfriends - we're renegades.
author: Lisa Bonet

quote: All issues are women's issues - and there are several that are just women's business.
author: Eddie Bernice Johnson

quote: Women may not have it easy, but we are given a fairer chance to reach for the top.
author: Jessica Savitch

quote: Were there no women, men might live like gods.
author: Thomas Dekker

quote: Whatever women do, they must do twice as well as men to be thought half as good. Luckily, this is not difficult.
author: Charlotte Whitton

quote: You women could make someone fall in love even with a lie.
author: Georg Buchner

quote: Intimacies between women often go backwards, beginning in revelations and ending in small talk.
author: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: God gave women intuition and femininity. Used properly, the combination easily jumbles the brain of any man I've ever met.
author: Farrah Fawcett

quote: In love, women are professionals, men are amateurs.
author: Francois Truffaut

quote: Women with money and women in power are two uncomfortable ideas in our society.
author: Candace Bushnell

quote: It is little men know of women; their smiles and their tears alike are seldom what they seem.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: All women's issues are to some degree men's issues and all men's issues are to some degree women's issues because when either sex wins unilaterally both sexes lose.
author: Warren Farrell

quote: The women's movement completely changed attitudes all over the world in ways we'll never be able to count.
author: Holly Near

quote: Years ago women of my size were considered royalty.
author: Camryn Manheim

quote: There was a time when men thought it was sexy to have a housewife waiting for him to come home from work in her slippers, but in modern society, I think an independent woman is even more sexy.
author: Kat Graham

quote: What we women need to do, instead of worrying about what we don't have, is just love what we do have.
author: Cameron Diaz

quote: Women's value has been under-recognized for far too long.
author: Sidney Sheldon

quote: Relationships are made of talk - and talk is for girls and women.
author: Deborah Tannen

quote: A homely face and no figure have aided many women heavenward.
author: Minna Antrim

quote: Nature makes woman to be won and men to win.
author: George William Curtis

quote: The test of civilization is its estimate of women.
author: George William Curtis

quote: The house a woman creates is a Utopia. She can't help it - can't help trying to interest her nearest and dearest not in happiness itself but in the search for it.
author: Marguerite Duras

quote: I don't love dolls. I love women. I love their bodies.
author: John Galliano

quote: Women are women, and hurray for that.
author: John Galliano

quote: Women are incredible in groups together. Terrifying. Men have nothing on them.
author: Michael Hutchence

quote: Women today have more of an overview of their lives and how marriage is or is not a part of it.
author: Helen Reddy

quote: Women don't realize how powerful they are.
author: Judith Light

quote: Women have this obsession with shoes.
author: Alexandra Paul

quote: Until Eve arrived, this was a man's world.
author: Richard Armour

quote: Women need space and silence. We too quickly give away our energy. There's something about holding that richness.
author: Natalie Goldberg

quote: Women want love to be a novel, men a short story.
author: Daphne du Maurier

quote: And I think women have come a very, very long way, but they have a long way to go.
author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quote: America is a land where men govern, but women rule.
author: John Mason Brown

quote: You're not working with models, you're working with real women who have, like, anatomy. Models do not have anatomy.
author: Isaac Mizrahi

quote: I'm surrounded by very powerful women and very progressive men.
author: Christie Hefner

quote: The only people you can really share certain things with in secret are your girlfriends.
author: Shirley Knight

quote: Women often postpone their lives, thinking that if they're not with a partner then it doesn't really count. They're still searching for their prince, in a way. And as much as we don't discuss that, because it's too embarrassing and too sad, I think it really does exist.
author: Jane Campion

quote: One hair of a woman can draw more than a hundred pair of oxen.
author: James Howell

quote: A lot of women say they love being pregnant, but I wasn't such a big fan.
author: Marion Jones

quote: Women are the first to jump on what is fashionable.
author: Gavin DeGraw

quote: Being a sex symbol has to do with an attitude, not looks. Most men think it's looks, most women know otherwise.
author: Kathleen Turner

quote: I think women get caught up too much in having a plan - 'I'm going to get married at this age; I'm going to have a kid at this age' - and then they just try to find a guy who will fit into that picture. I don't want my life to be based on that.
author: Julia Stiles

quote: Women are the sustaining force of any society - they think of the children and the next generation's chances.
author: Margo MacDonald

quote: Most women are indulgent of themselves. This is a mistake. It should be only the reward of old age.
author: Anna Held

quote: A woman should be like a single flower, not a whole bouquet.
author: Anna Held

quote: Women like myself, CEOs, can pave the way for more women to get to the top.
author: Andrea Jung

quote: Girls have an unfair advantage over men: if they can't get what they want by being smart, they can get it by being dumb.
author: Yul Brynner

quote: Women are clear-headed, they are more creative and for this reason, sometimes, also more fragile.
author: Emma Bonino

quote: My advantage as a woman and a human being has been in having a mother who believed strongly in women's education. She was an early undergraduate at Oxford, and her own mother was a doctor.
author: Antonia Fraser

quote: The term 'alpha female' originated in my field of animal behavior, but has acquired new meaning. It refers to women who are in charge, for example, by flirting and dating on their own terms. It is also used maliciously for a loud-mouthed, controlling woman who has no patience with deviating opinions.
author: Frans de Waal

quote: I always say God should have given women one extra decade at least, especially if you want a family. You're trying to pack a lot in.
author: Christine Baranski

quote: What bugs me is that movies don't reflect how interesting and vibrant women are. We don't treasure women as they get older.
author: Jill Clayburgh

quote: All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players: they have their exits and their entrances; and one man in his time plays many parts, his acts being seven ages.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: There is a great stir about colored men getting their rights, but not a word about the colored women; and if colored men get their rights, and not colored women theirs, you see, the colored men will be masters over the women, and it will be just as bad as it was before.
author: Sojourner Truth

quote: Women like me aren't supposed to run for office.
author: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

quote: Women ought to have representatives, instead of being arbitrarily governed without any direct share allowed them in the deliberations of government.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: Women are nothing but machines for producing children.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Here in America we are descended in blood and in spirit from revolutionists and rebels - men and women who dare to dissent from accepted doctrine. As their heirs, may we never confuse honest dissent with disloyal subversion.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
